attributes.action: to make public transport free to use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To make public transport free to use by everyone.
  Public Transport should be 24 hours a day 7 days a week and free.
 This would encourage far  more people to travel to and from work  using public transport instead of 1 person in 1 car nose to tail for a few hours each morning and afternoon.
